players.name: Alice
memory: You: "This is terrible! Charlie was killed on the first night. We need to think carefully about who could have done this and look for any suspicious behavior."

Diana: "Bob, your silence is indeed unusual. It's important for us to work together and share any information we may have. I suggest that you open up and tell us why you haven't spoken up yet."
